title: Why do some villagers have a glow?

Thirdly, does it cost anything to apply? Thanks in advance!

title: Why is my world not loading with optifine?

I get an error message that says "World folder missing" and then the game crashes. My world is only 32x32 so it shouldn't take up much space, but when I try to load it manually, I get the same error message. I've tried deleting the world folder and re-downloading it from my saves folder, but nothing works. Any ideas?

title: Is it possible to have a cross world portal?

title: Minecraft's secret ingredient?
self_text: My friend and I were talking about what makes minecraft so good, and we came to the conclusion that it’s the community. Like, without all of you people, there would be no Minecraft. You guys are like the secret ingredient. I know it sounds cheesy but it’s true. So here's a shoutout to everyone who ever created a mod, made a tutorial, answered questions on forums, or just chatted with someone else in chat. You make this game great. Also, if anyone wants to give me some tips for making my world look more vibrant and cool, let me know! Thank you all!

title: Is it possible to make a minecraft world like the ocean in the movie "Finders Keepers"?
self_text: I was wondering if it's possible to build an ocean that looks exactly like the one in the movie Finders Keepers using only mods and datapacks, or even custom code. It's not just the appearance but also the physics of the water and the way the waves break on the shore.  It is important that the whole thing looks and feels realistic.  I know it's going to be a long shot but wanted to check before putting too much effort into something that might be impossible.
